Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2014 12:21AM SaraK wrote: Nothing personal, my friend. I'm sure you're a wonderful person and never meant to offend anyone. Now that you are aware that many of us do take offense to what your screen name means (in some parts of the world), you need to decide whether you will be kind enough to accommodate our sensitivity on this issue or insist on insulting those members just because there is a different interpretation to the word... I try to be kind and considerate to others regardless of who's "right", and pray that God will be kind to me even when I'm undeserving.
Posts.Title: Is my condition severe? Need help Swastika mjm1
